title: It's a shame really
body: I like to play tanks and bruisers in top/jungle but when I play ranked I have to be a hard carry because having to work with someone else in this team game is just to risky and I don't want to get demoted because some pleb comes along and throws/feeds. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You can carry just fine on tanks, and honestly, you rely on your team just as much as a carry top/jungle because your depriving your team of a vital Tank.

I have decent win rates on Sej, Rek'sai, Volibear and Janna, none of them are carrys, all of them are built tank, what affects the game more is what you can do with the CC/utility you have on your champion.

Sure on the odd occasion you will lose because 1 carry has no clue what they are doing, but playing a carry doesn't make that any less likely.

EDIT: Also looking at your stats, i'd look at yourself before you go blaming your team as much as you do, your only 2 champs above a 2 KDA with more then 1 game are Cho and Naut, and no champ with more then 1 game has a positive win rate.

I love playing Sej in ranked lol she's like free wins. Shyv is good too. And Rek'Sai.

They're all pretty team dependent because they focus on CC, Peel and Engages and if your team fails, you fail.

Playing hard carries doesn't exclude you from being dependent on your team it's just easier to win with a few failures on your team if the carry isn't the one failing so if you are extremely good youll probably find you win more playing carries. People make mistakes for many reasons though but a carry making mistakes is far more costly however you cant always carry in solo queue and sometimes tank junglers etc fit the team more.
